column4: hello - I've installed ubuntu 3.0.017 , I am logged in as admin and am trying to edit /etc/apache2/site-available/default     -- for some reasons, I don't have the permissions and can't change them because I  need to be the root user. Why is that ? Thanks.
you should edit it with some higher privileges
- hi I am a newbie -  but I do I set up my root priviledge from the command terminal .... ?
